channel.title: Run client error+server
channel.description:
Whenever I make a update to the client anywhere, or source It wont run anymore, and no-one can connect when i turn it online this is the error i get int he client. If you can fix this message me plz.. Alex.case@live.com or on here. [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/21owlyt.png[/img]
A Reward is offered to the person who fix's it (ingame) or a level 103 runescape account with 14m on it.

item.title: Run client error+server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“minnergod1, post:9, topic:423586”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=526214.msg3832705#msg3832705 date=1322696383]
The client was compiled with JDK7, but you’re attempting to run it with Java 6.

You can either compile it with JDK6
Or upgrade your JRE to Java 7.
[/quote]
I have JRE 7 and jdk1.7.0 =/…[/quote]

Is your JDK7 the one included in your classpath? If you previously had 6, and set your environment variables, then installed 7, you need to modify the variable again.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @minnergod1 minnergod1
item.description:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:8, topic:423586”]The client was compiled with JDK7, but you’re attempting to run it with Java 6.

You can either compile it with JDK6
Or upgrade your JRE to Java 7.[/quote]
I have JRE 7 and jdk1.7.0 =/…

Read full topic

item.title: Run client error+server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The client was compiled with JDK7, but you’re attempting to run it with Java 6.

You can either compile it with JDK6
Or upgrade your JRE to Java 7.

item.title: Run client error+server
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

[quote=“minnergod1, post:1, topic:423586”]Whenever I make a update to the client anywhere, or source It wont run anymore, and no-one can connect when i turn it online this is the error i get int he client.
If you can fix this message me plz…
Alex.case@live.com or on here.

21owlyt.png732×370

A Reward is offered to the person who fix’s it (ingame) or a level 103 runescape account with 14m on it.[/quote]

the server files are messed up. i suggets find the messed up file and edit it to a working format and than compile.

for example: “at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)” - you can fix this by finding that line down on a file wheater it could be client.java or server.java , find it and edit it to a correct format or if dont have a correct format than i supose you delete that line.

Read full topic
